acf.egsr_quicktip: YOUR POWER IS CLEAR, BUT MAY SOMETIMES BE MISDIRECTED
acf.egsr_step1_descr:
YOUR POWER IS CLEAR, BUT MAY SOMETIMES BE MISDIRECTED

{FIRSTNAME}, I sense your soul is often misunderstood, with its sensitive, emotional center contained in a strong outer shield.

Others may think you’re pretty tough... all the way through to your core.

And they may even be intimidated by your stern exterior… but I can tune into the truth… you’re just not one to wear your heart on your sleeve.

For this reason you may let issues fester, before you finally come out and say what’s on your mind.

Your soul tends to put focus instead on directing energy to other things…

I’m sensing that you probably have a very enviable work ethic.

And you are forever climbing the mountain of your ambitions.

Something you’re likely to agree with is that you don’t like to do work that feels below your capabilities… always wanting to take on more challenging tasks to feel satisfied.

Your soul adores order… and feels balanced when everything in your world is safely where it needs to be.

Powerful souls take their work extremely seriously and can feel incredibly hurt when their hard work isn’t recognized…

This is a place where you can be held back… putting the opinions of the people closest to you on too high of a pedestal… and where negative energy can grow…

I intuitively feel that you’ve always been incredibly hard working, putting your whole soul into a project until it‘s complete.

But often you aren’t fully rewarded for the amount of work you put into everything...

I also sense that you are at a crossroads in your life regarding moving toward truly being rewarded for your years of investment in your future.

From my reading today I feel that an additional “Energy Reading” is necessary to find out exactly what’s been holding you back from achieving that all these years…
acf.egsr_step2_descr:
Sometimes We Just Can’t Control Everything… Allow The Universe To Do Some Of The Work...

Your energy is powerful and your soul’s biggest strength, though it can sometimes be its biggest weakness too…

Tell me something {FIRSTNAME}…

Do you find yourself trying to control ALL of the moving pieces of your life?

In this modern world we live in, it’s become almost impossible to catch every rock that hurtles towards us.. bills… chores... responsibilities…

Sometimes it’s okay to let a few of the less important things slide... in order to keep ourselves sane.

Sometimes negative energy can grow, especially when you worry about what will happen if you let things get piled up.

And often… the FEAR can be worse than the thing itself…

In order to banish the negative energy and raise your vibration you must connect deeper with the spiritual side of yourself.

Your path ahead will be foggy if you don’t make major efforts in this area.

This is a very critical time on your path {FIRSTNAME}. The decisions you make at this time will have a huge impact on your life for years to come.

And the way to know if you’re on the right path is usually found through a light reading… I’d like to give you one for free but first I need to ask you a few questions…
acf.egsr_step3_descr:
I believe there’s a great opportunity on the horizon for you…

When you allow some situations in your life to unfold... without your firm control, negative energy stirred up by worries will begin to evaporate.

Just like a pressure valve being opened and letting off steam, you’ll experience a huge sigh of relief.

Without your firm direction, situations and people close to you... will flourish in their own way.

Relieving you of unnecessary responsibility that your soul has carried for so long…

Then you can direct your light to the things that really matter.

You already have a powerful warrior soul {FIRSTNAME}, you can do this.

Bravely taking a step outside your comfort zone, allowing some things to JUST BE, will begin your spiritual quest… bringing the peace and stability you need… to reach your full potential.

You’re ready for an awakening…
